title: 20 pounds of movie in a 10 pound bag.
review: Sound design was great. Jon Voight captured Howard Cosell especially a scene where hi's hands shaking while smoking a cigarette. The movie had just too much in it. Civil Rights, Malcolm X, The FBI, The Army inductions, MLK slaying, Idi Amin, Zaire, Marriages, relationships with his father, relationships with his wives, Muslims in Chicago. As I said in the Summary - 20 pounds of movie in a 10 pound bag.
